quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Epica and Song
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, vocalist, opening. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Finish the opening line from the song ‘If I Were a Boy’ by Beyonce: ‘If I were a boy even just for I day, I’d …’.

options.text: Roll out of bed in the morning

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Roll out of bed in the morning

questions.question: Complete this line from Beyonce’s ballad ‘Wishing on a Star’: ‘And Im wishing on the rainbows that I see. Im wishing on the people who …’
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Really dream

questions.question: What Epica song do these lyrics belong to:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sancta Terra

questions.question: Before founding Epica, guitarist Mark Jansen was a member of this band.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: After Forever

questions.question: What is the missing phrase from Beyonce’s song ‘Sweet Dreams’: ‘You can be a sweet dream or a …’?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beautiful nightmare

questions.question: Simone Simons, known as the lead vocalist of metal ensemble Epica, was born in this year.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1985

questions.question: Simone Simons brother is a former member of Epica. What instrument did he play?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Drums

questions.question: What European country does the band Epica originate from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Netherlands

questions.question: Which of the following bands features Simone Simmons on their song Web of Lies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ayreon

questions.question: In the first verse of the song Al N Yetta, Al and Yetta are sitting together doing what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: watching TV

questions.question: What Epica song contains these lyrics:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Seif Al Din

questions.question: What is the name of Epicas second studio album?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Consign to Oblivion

questions.question: To what tune are the words for Al N Yetta set?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alouette

questions.question: In the song Al N Yetta, while sitting together, Al n Yetta decide to munch on what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: popcorn

questions.question: In 2007, Simone Simons nearly left Epica to join Finnish symphonic metal band Nightwish, after the departure of vocalist Tarja Turunen.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Song and Yetta
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, n, music. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: There are four shows that Al n Yetta watch in the song of the same name. Three of them are Gunsmoke, Bonanza, and Ben Casey. What is the fourth one?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Doctor Jim Kildaire

questions.question: In the song Al N Yetta, Mister Ed rhymes with stay in bed. Who is the other person that joins them in bed with Mister Ed?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Frankenstein

questions.question: What 2005 song by 30 Seconds to Mars opens with the line I wont suffer, be broken...?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Attack

questions.question: In the song Al N Yetta, what did Al tell Yetta that upsetta?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: picture tube had blown

questions.question: All n Yetta love to watch Loretta (Young) when she enters through that fancy door. The Real McCoys and The Bowery Boys are on Al n Yettas itinerary with who else?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Walter Cronkite

questions.question: To finish the stanza Al makes what rhyme about Dorothy Gish in the song Al N Yetta?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: what a dish

questions.question: What song by 30 Seconds to Mars contains the lyrics, Is this the only evidence that proves it, a photograph of you and I?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Was It a Dream

questions.question: Watching TV for so long, Al n Yetta enjoyed third reruns of what show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Millionaire

questions.question: Ive been thinking of everything I used to want to be... is the opening line of what 2008 single by 30 Seconds to Mars?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Story

questions.question: In the song Al N Yetta, from Hail, Bernstein - Whats My Line to Dorothy Gish - what a dish, how many other rhyming lines are in between?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 5

questions.question: Al n Yetta watched an operetta. Who told them what they saw?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Leonard Bernstein

questions.question: In the song Al N Yetta, while they both watched Meet the Press Yetta yearned for something or someone. What?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elliot Ness

questions.question: Al n Yetta from the self-titled song are fans of Art Linkletta and love to sing along with Mitch. What TV show do they enjoy watching reruns of?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: December Bride

questions.question: In the song Al N Yetta, Al n Yetta enjoyed fourth reruns of what show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yogi Bear Show

questions.question: After watching an operetta, Al n Yetta decided to switch to a quiz show. Which one?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Whats My Line

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Song and Seconds
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, people, title. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Ludwig van Beethoven was a German composer who lived 1770-1827. Of the following composers, which one did he NOT know personally?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Frederic Chopin

questions.question: The Talking Heads song, that can be given the title Subjects of Zoology, was never recorded live.

questions.question: What song by 30 Seconds to Mars contains the line, On a mountain he sits...?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: From Yesterday

questions.question: What single, released in 2008 by 30 Seconds to Mars includes the lyrics, Try to let go of the truth, the battles of the youth, cause this is just a game...?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Beautiful Lie

questions.question: If I said People Without a Special Interest in the Fields of Da Vinci, Michelangelo and Picasso Are Not Welcome is an alternate title to a Talking Heads song from the album More Songs About Buildings and Food, I would be correct, wouldnt I?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: A Talking Heads song title is the inspiration for a popular British bands name.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What is the actual alternative title for the song Drugs by Talking Heads?

questions.question: What song by 30 Seconds to Mars contains the lyrics, Come, break me down, bury me, bury me, I am finished with you?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Kill

questions.question: The Talking Heads song, which can be given the alternative title Planet I Occupy Is Flawless, had a music video featured in Storytelling Giant.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: The Talking Heads song, which can also be referred to as Must Be Paid When It Comes, was originally released on the album True Stories.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What song by 30 Seconds to Mars opens with the question, Did we create a modern myth?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Modern Myth

questions.question: The Talking Heads song that can also be recognized as My Feelings Are Mutual was released live for the first time in 2004, 26 years after its official live recording, on this album.

options.text: The Name of this Band is Talking Heads

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Name of this Band is Talking Heads

questions.question: Frederic Chopin (1810-1849) was a Polish composer who lived in Paris. With which one of the following piano composers was Chopin acquainted?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Franz Liszt

questions.question: What 30 Seconds to Mars song includes the lyrics,
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Buddha for Mary

questions.question: This Talking Heads song, which can alternatively be titled An Arc With Incredible Significance, is the longest track on their album, Remain in Light.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Ray Charles and Composers
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, composers, pianists. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Sergei Rachmaninoff (1873-1943) was a Russian composer who toured the world giving concerts.  Which one of the following composers did Rachmaninoff know personally?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pyotr Tchaikovsky

questions.question: Which of these composers who were also pianists had the largest hands?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sergei Rachmaninoff

questions.question: Which member of Ray Charles family died in a drowning accident?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His brother

questions.question: What is the title of Ray Charles song that was proclaimed the state song of the U.S. state of Georgia on April 24, 1979?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Georgia On My Mind

questions.question: This composer ran away from home at the age of 12, giving piano concerts to support himself.  Later in life he composed a masterwork for the piano which was highly regarded, but which many performers considered too difficult to play.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Isaac Albeniz

questions.question: What is the title of Ray Charles first number one single that paved his way to stardom?

options.text: Baby, Let Me Hold Your Hand

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: I Got a Woman

questions.question: Which of these classical composers was married to a famous pianist?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robert Schumann

questions.question: Of what disease did Chopin die?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tuberculosis

questions.question: Ray Charles has been arrested several times for this offense.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Possession of heroin

questions.question: Which of these composers wrote over 550 sonatas for keyboard?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Domenico Scarlatti

questions.question: Which of these composers who were also performing pianists was known for making women in his audience swoon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Franz Liszt

questions.question: How many children did Johann Sebastian Bach have?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 20

questions.question: At what age did Ray Charles start to lose his sight?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: At the age of five

questions.question: How many Grammy Awards did Ray Charles receive throughout his career?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Seventeen

questions.question: How many children did Ray Charles have?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Twelve

options.text: She sang in class disturbing everybody.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Subarachnoid hemorrhage

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 7

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gackt

questions.question: After drummer Kami died, how did Malice Mizer recognize him on their albums?

options.text: They dedicated each album to him but did recognize the new drummers.
They called him their eternal blood relative and didn’t name or recognize other drummers.
They only used pre-recorded tracks of his drumming.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They called him their eternal blood relative and didn’t name or recognize other drummers.

questions.question: David Bryan studied medicine before he joined the band Bon Jovi.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False
